value.title: How to use the Power BI Aggregations Feature
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam sits down with Christian Wade to discuss how to use the Power BI Aggregations feature. This video will show you the clicks to get to the clicky clicky draggy droppy awesomeness when working with big data, or even massive data. value.title: Power BI Auditing

value.title: Power BI For Report Consumers

value.title: Power BI PowerShell and the Admin API
value.excerpt: The Power BI PowerShell and the Admin API allow you to quickly inventory your organization and manage workspaces and access. value.title: Preventing Data Silos with Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick and Kalyn look at data silos and how to prevent it using Power BI. Different options exist, such as Analysis Services, Azure Analysis Services or models hosted in the Power BI service.  LET'S CONNECT!
